title: Remove CompressionTools
description: We do not use this class internally, and codec-level compression of stored fields should be a better alternative since it has the ability to compress several documents/values at once.

comments.author: ASF subversion and git services
comments.content:
Commit 894a8b275c75e5d8437f3f78d6dffde809a82694 in lucene-solr's branch refs/heads/master from Adrien Grand
[ https://git-wip-us.apache.org/repos/asf?p=lucene-solr.git;h=894a8b2 ]

LUCENE-7322: Remove CompressionTools.
